text: "Waltz #2 (XO)" is a song by American singer-songwriter Elliott Smith. It was released in 1998 by record label DreamWorks as the first single from his fourth studio album, XO. == Release == The single did not chart in the United States but reached number 52 in the UK Singles Chart, his highest chart placement in the UK to date. == Legacy == In its article on the song, Slate called it Elliott Smith's best song. == Track listing == == References == Category:Elliott Smith songs Category:1998 singles Category:DreamWorks Records singles Category:Song recordings produced by Tom Rothrock Category:1998 songs Category:Songs written by Elliott Smith
title: Waltz 2 (XO)
